election_record.label: New York 1805 State Senate, Eastern District

overview.note: Adam Quackenbush and John Quackenbush are amalgamations of two candidates.

The county and town votes add up to 7892 votes for John Veeder, 4613 for Joseph C. Yates, and 307 for John Thompson. However, the official canvass of votes gives 7893 votes for John Veeder, 4609 for Joseph C. Yates, and 310 for John Thompson.

sub_unit.name: Albany
sub_unit.note: Adam Comstock received 1 vote as Comstock Comstock Comstock.
The official canvass of votes lists 1220 votes for John Veeder and 929 votes for Joseph C. Yates.

sub_unit.name: Albany
sub_unit.note: The Albany Centinel (Albany, NY) lists 95 votes for Adam Comstock.

sub_unit.name: Clinton
sub_unit.note: Nicholas N. Quackenbush received 1 vote as Nicholas Quackenbush.
Adam Comstock received 1 vote as Adam Comsook.
Jacobus Van Schoonhoven received 22 votes as Jacob Van Schoonhoven.
The Albany Register (Albany, NY) lists 326 votes for John Veeder.

sub_unit.name: Montgomery
sub_unit.note: John Veeder received 1 vote as John S. Veeder and 1 vote as J. Veeder.
Adam Comstock received 3 votes as A. Comstock, 1 vote as Addam Comstock and 1 vote as Adan Comstock.
Joseph C. Yates received 9 votes as Joseph Yates.
Nicholas N. Quackenbush received 11 votes as Nicholas Quackenbush.
The Albany Gazette (Albany, NY) lists 1973 votes for John Veeder, 1747 votes for Adam Comstock, and 1653 votes for Joseph C. Yates.

sub_unit.name: Charlestown
sub_unit.note: The Albany Gazette (Albany, NY) lists 181 votes for Adam Comstock.

sub_unit.name: Rensselaer
sub_unit.note: Adam Comstock received 11 votes as Aaron Comstock.
The Albany Gazette (Albany, NY) lists 960 votes for Adam Comstock.

sub_unit.name: Saratoga
sub_unit.note: The Albany Gazette (Albany, NY) lists 1335 votes for John Veeder.

sub_unit.name: Ballston
sub_unit.note: Adam Comstock received 1 vote as Aam Comstock, 2 votes as A. Dam Cornstalk and 2 vote as A. Dam Crabstalk and 1 vote as A. Dam Whipstalk.
Joseph C. Yates received 2 votes as Joseph Yates.

sub_unit.name: Greenfield
sub_unit.note: Adam Comstock received 3 votes as A. Comstock.
Joseph C. Yates received 1 vote as Joseph C. Y..

sub_unit.name: Malta
sub_unit.note: Nicholas N. Quackenbush received 4 votes as Nicholas Quackenbush.
Joseph C. Yates received 1 vote as Joseph Yates.

sub_unit.name: Northumberland
sub_unit.note: Joseph C. Yates received 1 vote as Joseph Yates.

sub_unit.name: Saratoga
sub_unit.note: The Albany Gazette (Albany, NY), May 13, lists 20 votes for Joseph C. Yates.

sub_unit.name: Washington
sub_unit.note: John Veeder received 1 vote as John T. Weeder.
